name: Math.sqrt()
content: There are some math calculations that require you to take the square root. *Math.sqrt(x)* does not change the value of x, rather it returns the the square root of x.

examples.name: Square Root of 16
examples.description: Calculates the square root of 16 and prints it on the console.

palette_params.name: x
palette_params.description: A number to take the square root of

return_value: A number that is the square root of x
short_description: Takes the square root of x.
